content: or k2tog on the next row remember you will still need to make a stitch at the end of the final row of the heel to make sure you have the same number of stitches on the bottom needle as you have on the top needle ie 32 sts © fiona bennett 2009 charydis socks page 5 leg now you will return to working in the round over both needles knit one round using the pattern repeat outlined in black in the chart continue on from where you left off over your instep needle stitches and continue the pattern on over the stitches on the sole needle continue in pattern until leg is desired length cuff work round in 2x2 rib k2 p2 repeat or your choice of rib pattern for about an inch bind off all sts using your favourite stretchy bind off mine is jeny staiman s surprisingly stretchy bind off which you can find directions for here http //www knitty com/issuefall09/featjssbo php weave in ends and block if desired wear and enjoy and beware sea monsters © fiona bennett 2009
